name: Avenging Alpha
description:
Sure, we've all played those classic space shooters back in the day. This is not one of those games. Want to play a game with a new concept? Give this one a try.  Oh you made it to the end? But did you get a gold star for every level? Did you find the secret levels? Maybe you can unlock the mysteries of the universe. Maybe you can stumble upon never before seen future technology. Maybe you can find the remains of an ancient race that time has forgotten and thought was erased forever. 

Avenging Alpha is in early access and is a Space Action Shooter with RPG elements that will also feature future platformer levels as well.  A new take on the space shooter genre. Story rich with deep lore and history. A deep immersive story with bonus levels and special secrets that can be found as you traverse the ever expanding universe.
